AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.label: Insect Breath
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene strike with swift, venomous precision, mimicking the lethal stings of insects. Their movements conjure phantom butterflies, embodying both beauty and death.
AnimeArsenal.BreathingTechniqueGeneDef.resourceDescription: Current stored Breath, refined for precision. This energy enables swift and venomous insect-based techniques.
